DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Required Response ISO21090.ANY.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The reply necessary to include/exclude a potential subject on a study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Required Response
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question, request, criticism, or accusation.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Observation Reuse Template Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question, request, criticism, or accusation.

Concepts.definition: Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question, request, criticism, or accusation.
